title: Sovereign AGI Intent Schema (M-01)
description: Defines the canonical structure for autonomous action Intents, ensuring traceability and unambiguous execution.

intent_id.description: Globally unique traceability identifier (UUID v4 recommended).

priority.description: Execution priority level, critical for resource scheduling.

target.description: The specific internal component or module targeted for execution (e.g., 'EvolutionEngine', 'MemoryCore').

action_verb.description: The atomic command or operational request (e.g., 'REFINE', 'SCAFFOLD', 'COMMIT', 'QUERY').

parameters.description: Specific key-value pairs required by the action_verb for execution.

context.description: Metadata regarding the origin and temporal state of the intent request.

constraints.description: Optional operational limits or dependencies for execution (e.g., max_time, dependency_ids, required_integrity_level).
